title: 107_s2557
content: Medicare Improvements for Special Needs Beneficiaries Act of 2002 - Amends part C (MedicareChoice) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for specialized MedicareChoice plans for special needs beneficiaries and the treatment of such plans as coordinated care plans under Medicare part C. Permits restriction on the enrollment of individuals in a specialized MedicareChoice plan to special needs beneficiaries. Establishes additional requirements for specialized Medicarechoice plans for special needs beneficiaries.
